basics.name: Jason Manshadi
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: I am an developer from C++ and Java origins, now focusing on adding wed development to my resume with personal projects listed below.

profiles.username: This Resume is built from this Github Repo

Technical Work Experience.summary: Responded to internal IT tickets raised and diagnosed issues regarding software and hardware issues with virtual and physical machines.
highlights: Became more familiar with UNIX and Linux operating systems
Assisted in the migration from NIS to LDAP directory services protocol
Troubleshooted issues with NIS and LDAP configurations on Linux and UNIX machines
Learned how to create and delete Solaris Zones from scratch and from a standard flar
Created Red Hat and SuSE templates for vSphere
Coordinated with HPe, IBM, and Oracle if servers went down and were facing hardware failures
Assisted in the maintenance outage with involved shutting down the Solaris, Red Hat, SuSE, AIX and HP-UX machines, bring them back up and deal with the software and hardware failures that arised

Technical Work Experience.summary: Customizes the development and production JIRA environments for individual project and team purposes.
highlights: Learned more Linux commands to be able to navigate the Red Hat Linux environment
Wrote a manual to allow for new users to use the SalesForce JIRA project and SalesForce Service Desk project
Learned how to add, remove and modify users on Windows Active Directory using PowerShell
Led upgrade process for JIRA environments which involved researching needed steps for upgrading, coordinating with multiple colleagues for setting up and testing the environment
Cleaned sales on Postgres Database which required contacting all departments and individual who used sales and customizing the cleaning script to take their sales into account
Created a PowerShell script for automating the process of creating user, activating users and deactivating uses in any specified Salesforce organization
